home.TextParagraphOne: Human-centred design (HCD) is an approach to problem-solving that prioritizes the needs, desires, and behaviours of the people who will use the product, system, or service.
home.TextParagraphTwo: It involves understanding users perspectives through observation, interviews,and empathy-building exercises.
home.TextParagraphThree: By focusing on the human experience, HCD aims to create products and services that are intuitive, user-friendly, and ultimately more effective in addressing real-world challenges.
